kizuna_ecology_b_02:
I see you’ve already registered 30 species of
Pokémon to your Pokédex for me![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_b_03:
Wow! So you caught this kind of Pokémon?
And this one?! All this data... This is the best![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_b_04: Ah...sorry about that. I got a little excited there.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_b_05:
But I get the feeling that you’re going to be a
great help in my Pokémon research.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_b_06:
Here, take these. Consider it my way of saying
thanks.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_b_07:
You sure are good at catching Pokémon, aren’t
you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_b_08: For your next goal, let’s aim for 100 species![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_b_09:
Remember—when you find a Pokémon you’ve
never seen before, give a Poké Ball a throw![VAR 0114(002A)]
